youngAndEnthusiasticFullStackWebDevelope: Young and enthusiastic full-stack web developer
aboutMeText: I'm developer of web applications. I'm able to plan work, design and program software. I work within the area of development 2,5 years. At first I worked in PHP with the Nette framework. Then I switched to more modern technologies based on JavaScript and Node.js. I am also familiar with UI design, databases and REST API, creating tasks according to assignment and estimation of complexity.
motivationText:
I made the website to introduce myself to you and sign up for a frontend developer job offer in your company. Here is the code of that page: github.com/xnesme00/cv-logex

I would sincerely like to contribute to improving the quality of medicine through programming.
studyingText: Successfully completed bachelor degree on Faculty of Information Technology at Brno University of Technology
TFWorkDescription:
Technologies: JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, Vue.js, React, SQL, TypeORM.

The scope of my work was design and implementation of UI and REST API.

Projects:

  • frontent of application for managing software product settings, making payments and communicating with support,
  • frontent and backend of the internal company management system,
  • frontent and backend of application for transport company (tickets and goods sale, processing of applications for chip cards, etc.).

Internal exam from the book "Clean Code".
IWWorkDescription: Development of a CRM system for obtaining customer requirements for a web in PHP 7 language (Nette framework), SQL and JavaScript (jQuery framework). The CRM system was also a practical part of my bachelor's thesis.
hobbyText: Also, I like to dance lindy hop and other swing dances 💃🏼
imLookingForwardToYourReply: I look forward to your reply 🙂
